body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Roberts Auto Solutions. My name is Gregory Roberts. May I please have your name?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Michelle. Can you provide me with your phone number for contact purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five, two zero zero, eight eight zero zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you. Could you also confirm your address to ensure accurate delivery?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course. My address is three seven five, Elm Street, Oakville.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Michelle. Your concerns about the shipment are noted, and we will address them promptly.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I appreciate that, Gregory. I'm feeling nervous about the delivery, so thank you for your assistance.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Michelle. If you have any more questions or need further help, feel free to contact us. Thank you for your time today. Goodbye.
